name: Carnivores - Ice Age [PSPM]
description:
Carnivores: Ice Age throws you onto a recently discovered planet to test your hunting tactical skills on a realistic ice safari. The hunter, equipped with various weapons and all sorts of hunting accessories like camouflage and cover scent, needs not only to be quiet when approaching a beast but also take care of wind direction and covering his human smell not to end up as an animal's dinner. Unrivaled possibility to wander around the open 3D world without limits makes the process of finding prey exciting and the whole game endlessly replayable.
Pack your equipment and start hunting prehistoric creatures in Carnivores: Ice Age as you are ready to explore the new huge icy world.
• 5 huge areas with different landscape and climate, open for exploration
• True-to-life hunting experience with 7 weapons
• 3D animals, from the Saber-tooth Tiger to Woolly Rhinoceros
• Hunting accessories to be used for smart hunting
• An interactive Trophy room
